warn.msgbox.line1: Warning: The program path contains non-English characters!
warn.msgbox.line3: This may cause the following issues:
warn.msgbox.line4: • Some resource files may fail to load correctly
warn.msgbox.line6: • It is recommended to move the program to a pure English path
warn.msgbox.line7: Do you want to continue running?
warn.msgbox.title: Path Warning - Random Name Program

settings.outoflimit.alpha: Size cannot exceed 255 or be less than 0

error.opengl.title: OpenGL Version Incompatible
error.opengl.line3: Your graphics card or driver does not support the required OpenGL version.
error.opengl.line4: Please try updating your graphics driver or use a graphics card that supports higher OpenGL versions.
error.glfw.title: GLFW Initialization Failed
error.glfw.message:
Failed to initialize GLFW library.

Possible causes:
• System does not support OpenGL
• Missing required system libraries
• Graphics driver issues

The program will exit.
error.glad.title: GLAD Initialization Failed
error.glad.message:
Failed to load OpenGL functions.

Possible causes:
• OpenGL context creation failed
• Incompatible graphics driver
• Corrupted system OpenGL libraries

The program will exit.
error.window.title: Window Creation Failed
error.window.message:
Failed to create program window.

Possible causes:
• Graphics card does not support required OpenGL version
• Insufficient system resources
• Display configuration issues

The program will exit.
error.config.title: Configuration Initialization Failed
error.config.message:
Failed to initialize program configuration.

Possible causes:
• Corrupted configuration file
• Insufficient disk permissions
• Invalid configuration file format

The program will continue with default settings.
error.explorer.title: Resource Manager Initialization Failed
error.explorer.message:
Failed to initialize resource manager.

Possible causes:
• Missing resource files
• Insufficient file permissions
• Audio/video codec issues

The program will exit.
error.openGL.message:
Make sure your graphics card supports OpenGL 4.0 or higher.

If you are using an integrated graphics card, consider updating your drivers or switching to a dedicated graphics card.

If you are using a virtual machine, ensure it supports OpenGL 4.0 or higher.
